site.title: MajupLabs - AI Consulting & Development
site.description: Expert AI Consulting, ML, LLMs, RAG, and Applied AI Solutions for Your Business.
hero.title: MajupLabs
hero.description: We are an Applied AI Engineering Firm specializing in Data Science, Machine Learning, and AI Integration for startups and established companies looking to leverage AI effectively.
hero.expertise: Our expertise includes ML, LLMs, RAG, Search and Recommendation systems, VRP, and Data-driven decisions.
consulting.title: On-Demand AI Consulting: From Concept to Production
consulting.intro: Struggling to turn your AI ideas into reality? We specialize in helping startups and established tech companies bridge the gap between AI concepts and production-ready solutions.
consulting.clients: Our clients leverage our expertise in ML, LLMs, RAG, Search, Evaluations, Recommendation systems, and data-driven decision-making to achieve tangible business outcomes.
consulting.challenges.title: Are you facing these challenges?
consulting.challenge.1: Difficulty integrating AI into existing products or workflows?
consulting.challenge.2: Uncertainty about the right AI strategy for your business goals?
consulting.challenge.3: Struggles with scaling AI prototypes to production-level systems?
consulting.help: If so, we can help. We offer specialized consulting services designed to take your AI projects from ideation to successful deployment.
